title: Did "Antepha America " threaten " to take what is ours from the spoop?
subtitle: A tweet was published in the midst of nationwide protests and riots due to the death in custody of George Floyd, which caused panic. But it was a trick.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A group calling itself "Antiva America" threatened to take what is our suburban in May 2020 after the riots in the main cities of the country to protest the death of a black man in police custody.
